ttl_rs_qty = #{ttlRsQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ttl_rs_box = #{ttlRsBox,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ttl_rs_val = #{ttlRsVal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ttl_rs_tax = #{ttlRsTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ttl_rs_mkv = #{ttlRsMkv,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ttl_rp_qty = #{ttlRpQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ttl_rp_box = #{ttlRpBox,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ttl_rp_val = #{ttlRpVal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ttl_rp_tax = #{ttlRpTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ttl_rp_mkv = #{ttlRpMkv,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
opr_id = #{oprId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
op_time = #{opTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
effective = #{effective,jdbcType=CHAR},
progress = #{progress,jdbcType=CHAR},
cancelled = #{cancelled,jdbcType=CHAR},
renewed = #{renewed,jdbcType=CHAR},
exec_psc_num = #{execPscNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
itmd_psc_num = #{itmdPscNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
st_psc_num = #{stPscNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
end_psc_num = #{endPscNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
base_psc_num = #{basePscNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ttl_expd_rwd = #{ttlExpdRwd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ttl_deliv_rwd = #{ttlDelivRwd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ttl_rcv_rwd = #{ttlRcvRwd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where psc_num = #{pscNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into psc
psc_num,
doc_date,
psc_type,
vendee_id,
vde_fscl_unit_id,
vde_wareh_id,
end_unit_id,
end_wareh_id,
vde_invd,
puc_auto_gen,
puc_gen,
puc_auto_chk,
is_pu_itmd,

st_unit_id,
st_wareh_id,

dr_diff_jgd,

mapper.update:
update psc
puc_gen = #{pucGen},
slc_gen = #{slcGen},
where psc_num = #{pscNum}
update psc set tasks_in_rcv=IFNULL(tasks_in_rcv,0)+1 where psc_num = #{pscNum}
update psc set tasks_in_rcv=IFNULL(tasks_in_rcv,0)-1 where psc_num = #{pscNum}

update psc
vde_fscl_unit_id = #{vdeFsclUnitId}, vdr_fscl_unit_id = #{vdrFsclUnitId},
puc_gen = #{pucGen,jdbcType=CHAR},
slc_gen = #{slcGen,jdbcType=CHAR},
effective = #{effective,jdbcType=CHAR},
progress = #{progress,jdbcType=CHAR},
cancelled = #{cancelled,jdbcType=CHAR},
renewed = #{renewed,jdbcType=CHAR},
ttl_expd_rwd = #{ttlExpdRwd},
where psc_num = #{pscNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select psc.psc_num from psc psc left join ${srcType} a on a.psc_num = psc.psc_num where 1=1 and a.unit_id=#{srcUnitId} and a.${srcType}_num = #{srcNum}
mapper.update:
UPDATE psc psc INNER JOIN puc puc ON puc.psc_num = psc.psc_num INNER JOIN stb stb ON stb.src_doc_unit_id = puc.unit_id AND stb.src_doc_num = puc.puc_num
psc.ttl_rp_qty = IFNULL( psc.ttl_rp_qty, 0 ) + stb.ttl_qty, psc.ttl_rp_box = IFNULL( psc.ttl_rp_box, 0 ) + stb.ttl_box, psc.ttl_rp_val = IFNULL( psc.ttl_rp_val, 0 ) + stb.ttl_val, psc.ttl_rp_tax = IFNULL( psc.ttl_rp_tax, 0 ) + stb.ttl_tax, psc.ttl_rp_mkv = IFNULL( psc.ttl_rp_mkv, 0 ) + stb.ttl_mkv,
psc.ttl_rp_qty = IFNULL( psc.ttl_rp_qty, 0 ) - stb.ttl_qty, psc.ttl_rp_box = IFNULL( psc.ttl_rp_box, 0 ) - stb.ttl_box, psc.ttl_rp_val = IFNULL( psc.ttl_rp_val, 0 ) - stb.ttl_val, psc.ttl_rp_tax = IFNULL( psc.ttl_rp_tax, 0 ) - stb.ttl_tax, psc.ttl_rp_mkv = IFNULL( psc.ttl_rp_mkv, 0 ) - stb.ttl_mkv,
WHERE puc.psc_num = #{pscNum} AND stb.unit_id = #{docUnitId} AND stb.stb_num = #{docNum}

UPDATE psc psc INNER JOIN puc puc ON puc.psc_num = psc.psc_num INNER JOIN stb stb ON stb.src_doc_unit_id = puc.unit_id AND stb.src_doc_num = puc.puc_num
psc.ttl_rs_qty = IFNULL( psc.ttl_rs_qty, 0 ) + stb.ttl_qty, psc.ttl_rs_box = IFNULL( psc.ttl_rs_box, 0 ) + stb.ttl_box, psc.ttl_rs_val = IFNULL( psc.ttl_rs_val, 0 ) + stb.ttl_val, psc.ttl_rs_tax = IFNULL( psc.ttl_rs_tax, 0 ) + stb.ttl_tax, psc.ttl_rs_mkv = IFNULL( psc.ttl_rs_mkv, 0 ) + stb.ttl_mkv,
psc.ttl_rs_qty = IFNULL( psc.ttl_rs_qty, 0 ) - stb.ttl_qty, psc.ttl_rs_box = IFNULL( psc.ttl_rs_box, 0 ) - stb.ttl_box, psc.ttl_rs_val = IFNULL( psc.ttl_rs_val, 0 ) - stb.ttl_val, psc.ttl_rs_tax = IFNULL( psc.ttl_rs_tax, 0 ) - stb.ttl_tax, psc.ttl_rs_mkv = IFNULL( psc.ttl_rs_mkv, 0 ) - stb.ttl_mkv,
WHERE puc.psc_num = #{pscNum} AND stb.unit_id = #{docUnitId} AND stb.stb_num = #{docNum}
